title: October 24, 2019: Pundi X (NPXS): Down 3.79%
text:
Pundi X Price Update

Pundi X is down by approximately 3.79% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.000175 USD. The past 24 hours mark a reversal in price from the day prior; it should be noted, though, that price is still in a down trend, and is currently 13.19% below its 20 day moving average. Staying above this level may be critical to sustain short-term momentum. Pundi X’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.000169 and $0.000234. As we are closer to the bottom of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring buying opportunities.

Trade Pundi x (NPXS) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

As for Pundi X’s market cap, it is currently at about $39M US dollars.

Straight Off the Chain

No transactions amongst holders of Pundi X occurred yesterday. In terms of estimating the number of holders, over the past day the total number of wallets holding Pundi X has gone down by approximately 0. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Pundi X ranked 19 out of the 35 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

How are the Strong Holders of Pundi X Faring?

In terms of wealth concentration, the richest 1,000 wallets own 87.81% of the coin’s total money supply. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 12.27% of the currency’s money supply. Exchange ownership grew by 0.04% over the past week, while the overall ownership percentage of the top 1,000 richest wallets grew by -0.04% over that time period. The underlying smart contract itself for Pundi X owns 0.02% of the total money supply; over the past week, this amount has not changed.

Pundi X’s Social Media Presence

Traders interested in following Pundi X has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 66,659 users engaged. Use this link to follow Pundi X on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Pundi x, listed under the symbol NPXS, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX.

Article by SixJupiter
